Hero.Description_Part1: My name is Hayssem Vazquez-Elsayed, and I'm a Product Manager.
Hero.Description_Part2: Coupled with my 6+ years of experience in building B2B and B2C products, I'm passionate about web development, data analysis, and product design. I love to build ( and occasionally develop ) astounding digital experiences.

Footer.Title: Hayssem Vazquez-Elsayed
Footer.Description: Senior Product Manager building products to help bitcoin miners maximize their hashrate.

Confsquare.Description_Part1: I'm the co-founder of Confsquare: a startup focus on building better experience for event organization and management.
Confsquare.Description_Part2: We are building a new event platform enabling our users to create more connections with their community through the in-house concept of Rooms.

Expertise.SectionDescription: Things I've learned along the way
Expertise.Description1: 6+ years of experience working on high-impact user and developer-facing products including web applications, APIs, and SDKs.
Expertise.Description2: I'm eager to interact with my users to gather feedback, to build design concept ideas through sketches, prototypes, and wireframes.
Expertise.Description3: Throughout my passion for databases and data models, I've built fluency with qualitative and quantitative data collection and decision-making methodologies.

About.Title: Product Manager + Product Owner (PSPO) & Scrum Master Certified (PSM)
About.Paragraph1: I am Hayssem Vazquez-Elsayed, a product manager building products to help bitcoin miners
About.Paragraph1a: maximizing their hashrate. I'm also building a online event platform : Confsquare.
About.Paragraph2: Before that, I worked at Societe Generale Corporate and Investment Banking building products and experience for developers as well as being part of the innovation center and doing product exploration.
About.Paragraph2bis: Environments that foster ambition, curiosity, humility, and happiness are where I excel. I'm drawn to teams that share a goal of creating substantial change for individuals, society, and our global community.

Project.SectionDescription: Built to practice web development skills
